directions: In a large bowl, combine rice, green pepper, onion, green onions, crawfish tails, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, margarine, parsley, and Cajun seasoning. Pour into rice cooker, and cook for 1 cycle, or until liquid is absorbed, about 30 minutes. Taste, and adjust seasonings.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning, or to taste
title: Rice Cooker Crawfish Tails
